name: Platformer2D ( New Version )
description:
New version of my previous Platformer2D with new code and new controls !   

( Started 21/10/22 )

Currently, only test but content coming really soon.

Controls :

- ZQSD - movement

- Right click - Dash

- Space - Jump/Double Jump

- Left click - Attack

-  (When on a One Way platform) S + Space - Go Down

- (When on a double jump) left Click - Ground Dash Attack

- Add S on previous control to go through any one way platform when Ground Dashing

GitHub
